class.name: ResourceImporterCSVTranslation
class.description: Comma-separated values are a plain text table storage format. The format's simplicity makes it easy to edit in any text editor or spreadsheet software. This makes it a common choice for game localization. [b]Example CSV file:[/b] [codeblock lang=text] keys,en,es,ja GREET,"Hello, friend!","Hola, amigo!",こんにちは ASK,How are you?,Cómo está?,元気ですか BYE,Goodbye,Adiós,さようなら QUOTE,"""Hello"" said the man.","""Hola"" dijo el hombre.",「こんにちは」男は言いました [/codeblock]

members.member: If [code]true[/code], creates an [OptimizedTranslation] instead of a [Translation]. This makes the resulting file smaller at the cost of a small CPU overhead.
The delimiter to use in the CSV file. The default value matches the common CSV convention. Tab-separated values are sometimes called TSV files.
